column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: Two men riding a motorbike crashed into a car driven by a Korean national. A korean was slightly injured and the two on the motorbike were seriously hurt after the incident at 10:40 pm on March 28
column6: Khan Toul Kork.------According to the source
column8: two men riding a white scooter  at high speed
column10: local authorities took away the vehicles. The injured were sent to hospital.------
